alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 10 at 2:36AM PDT until October 12 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PDT THURSDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures at or below 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Lincoln County. * WHEN...2 AM to 8 AM PDT Thursday and 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
